attributes.comment:
As you know, the above petitions and services are required for U.S. citizens
adopting foreign-born children and bringing them home to the United States .
These are often citizens who have already undergone tremendous financial and
emotional strain to bring a child into their lives, and the proposed fee
increases -- at an average of 66% -- only put the dream of parenthood that much
further out of reach for Americans of low and middle incomes. These citizens go
to great lengths to secure the extensive funding necessary for adoption, and
every increase in costs pushes adoption, and thus parenthood, beyond the realm
of possibility for more families.

Please do not increase fees for the above listed petitions and services, which
would be to the detriment of hopeful, would-be parents. Thank you very much for
your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nicole Wang
